options.name: Heritage of Will
options.description: Humans have a willful culture, and become endurant and resistant to magic. Gain +1 Resistance and +1 Resilience

options.name: Pride in Diversity
options.description: Humans have many sub-cultures and intermingle with other ancestries and culture groups. Gain +1 Persuasion and learn a non-Magical Language.

options.name: Paladin Orders
options.description: Human cultures are impacted heavily by faith, often bordering on fanaticism. Learn 2 Beginner and 2 Novice Divine Spells and gain +1 Damage with Slashing Weapons.

options.name: Adaptive
options.description: Human culture demands adaptation to thrive. Gain +1 Elemental Mitigation, +1 Arcane Mitigation and +1 Psychic Mitigation

options.name: Folk Hero
options.description: Human cultures place heroes on pedestals so that others seek to replicate their glory. Gain +1 Block to all shields and +1 Physical Mitigation

options.name: Corrupted by Temptation
options.description: Zealotry is always a danger within Human culture, and can lead to dangerous beliefs. Learn 3 Beginner and 3 Novice Fiend Spell and gain +2 Divine Mitigation.

options.name: Free Action : Glorykill
options.description: Whenever you land a killing blow on a Creature your Level or higher, you can grant an allied player a Heroic Action
